ygData.subject: Re: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: expensive? yes, in the short term maybe.  in the long term, if you aren t a warrior and cant wear the armor, i know that it can be sold for 1500-2000pp (going
ygData.messageBody:
expensive? yes, in the short term maybe. in the long term, if you aren't
a warrior and cant wear the armor, i know that it can be sold for
1500-2000pp (going price for greaves). not a bad return on a couple
hundred plat, not to mention the xp you get.

On Tue, 3 Aug 1999, Mark S. Foster wrote:

> From: "Mark S. Foster" <markf@...>
>
> Hmm, Has anyone tried to keep doing the same Quest over and over again,
> Yeah, It might be expensive, But would it be worth the Exp in the long run?
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Diina, David <DDiina@...>
> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 9:28 AM
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor
>
>
> > From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
> >
> > The exp was unbelievable....I have gained almost 2 bubbles off 4 pieces at
> > lvl 30-33....b4 I realized I was gaining so much exp I kinda dreaded
> running
> > all the way over there to SK.....but I made more exp in like 2 mins than
> you
> > can make in a night :-)
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jason Harrell [mailto:jharrell@...]
> > Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 4:00 PM
> > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor
> >
> > From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
> >
> > Yeah, but in my case over half bub per completion... quite a
> > nice surprise.
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Brett P Gillmore [mailto:bgillmor@...]
> > Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 2:03 PM
> > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > Subject: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor
> >
> >
> > From: "Brett P Gillmore" <bgillmor@...>
> >
> >
> >
> > Gladly so too. Its about time quests start giving some exp
> > again, also its
> > around a lvl 25 and up quest so there should be a nice size
> > chunk of exp.
> > Granted you have to cash out like 278 plat for the gems.
> > (for the star
> > rubies).
> > I only completed the gauntlets portion as of yet but hope
> > that the exp gain
> > is
> > the same or more for the rest of the items too.
> >
> > Also anyone wanna sell some good wisdom eq on sol server?
> > Got alot of money
> > to
> > burn.
> >
